name: xls_campaign_api_v1
description:
XLS Campaign API Postman Collection. At this stage, the following API is developed.

01 CAMPAIGN - 1.1  POST Create new Amount Discount Campaign (XLS-36, XLS-113, XLS-100,XLS-134, XLS-85)
01 CAMPAIGN - 1.2 POST Create new Amount Discount Common Validations (XLS-36, XLS-113, XLS-100)
02 CAMPAIGN - 1.1 Delete Campaign (XLS-50, XLS-108)
03 CAMPAIGN - 1.1 GET Campaign by ID (XLS-38, XLS-134)
03 CAMPAIGN - 1.2 GET All Campaigns (XLS-37, XLS-134)
04 CAMPAIGN - Compute campaign statistics used in ME app dashboard (XLS-141)

Curretly, the API only support RFM Discount campaigns only (Amount/Frequency). Some of the features of the camapaign is not yet implemented like:
--multi-Merchant
--award capping
--multiple scenarios
--scenario counter reset
--repeat reward
--award entities
--transaction attributes
--filtering definition
--payment card brand
--image url
--liability distribution

folders.name: 01 CAMPAIGN - 1.1  POST Create new Amount Discount Campaign (XLS-36, XLS-113, XLS-100,XLS-134, XLS-85)
folders.description:
This test case is to test the following story.

XLS-36 CAMPAIGN APIs - Creates a new cumulative amount campaign with instant discount - no auto subscription of campaign

XLS-100 CAMPAIGN APIs - Creates a new cumulative amount campaign with instant discount - With auto subscription of campaign

XLS-113 CAMPAIGN APIs - Creates a new "Merchant" cumulative amount campaign with instant discount - no auto subscription of campaign

XLS-134 CAMPAIGN APIs - Refactor the POST Campaign API & Get All campaigns API to align with the new changes in Swagger

XLS-85 CAMPAIGN APIs - Create a new campaign visit with Instant Discount - no auto subscription of campaign

XLS-133 CAMPAIGN APIs - Create a new campaign visit with Instant Discount - With auto subscription of campaign



Nominal cases.
Some Error cases.

folders.name: 01 CAMPAIGN - 1.2 POST Create new Amount Discount Common Validations (XLS-36, XLS-113, XLS-100)
02 CAMPAIGN - 1.1 Delete Campaign (XLS-50, XLS-108)
folders.description:
Prerequisites
The campaign is unsubscribed from XLS UI admin
The campaign is a Merchant campaign (ownertype = Merchant) or a bank campaign (ownertype = System)

References
Description of Campaigns API at https://xls76b1_dev_swagger.wrtloyalty.com/?url=swagger/nextGen/campaign_api.yaml/#!/Campaign/deleteCampaign

Operation
DELETE /campaign/
{campaignId}

Request parameter
• From: mandatory, User identifier for the user performing the operation. Typically email address is used but we allow any user login
• campaignId : mandatory, campaign identifer

folders.name: 03 CAMPAIGN - 1.1 GET Campaign by ID (XLS-38, XLS-134)
folders.description:
References
Description of Campaigns API at https://xls76b1_dev_swagger.wrtloyalty.com/?url=swagger/nextGen/campaign_api.yaml/#!/Campaign/lookupCampaignByUniqueIdentifier

Operation
GET /campaign/
{campaignId}

Request parameter
• From: mandatory, User identifier for the user performing the operation. Typically email address is used but we allow any user login
• campaignId : mandatory, campaign identifer
• expand: Default - All

folders.name: 03 CAMPAIGN - 1.2 GET All Campaigns (XLS-37, XLS-134)
folders.description:
References
Description of Campaigns API at xxxx/Campaign/lookupCampaigns

Operation
GET /campaigns /

Request parameter
• Api-Key : refer JIRA XLS-55 *mandatory
• Api-Version : refer JIRA XLS-55 *1 by default
• From: mandatory, User identifier for the user performing the operation. Typically email address is used but we allow any user login
• page: not managed at this stage.
• limit query: not managed at this stage.
• Status : Campaign status. Default - All.
• Type : Campaign type. Default - All
• Expand: Default - All
• corporateId : Not managed at this stage
• merchantId : Filter on merchant ID when retrieving all campaigns
• deviceId : Not managed at this stage

Security
We assume that the security will be managed later however at this stage, we would like at least the BASIC Security for all web services

folders.name: 04 CAMPAIGN - Compute campaign statistics used in ME app dashboard (XLS-141)
folders.description:
Generate campaign statistics based on transactions triggering campaigns.

References
Description of Campaign API at https://xls76b1_dev_swagger.wrtloyalty.com/?url=swagger/nextGen/campaign_api.yaml#!/Campaign/computeCampaignStatistics

Operation
POST /campaign/statistics

Request parameter
• Api-Key : refer JIRA XLS-55 *mandatory
• Api-Version : refer JIRA XLS-55 *1 by default
• From: mandatory, User identifier for the user performing the operation. Typically email address is used but we allow any user login

Security
We assume that the security will be managed later however at this stage, we would like at least the BASIC Security for all web services

Structures used on campaign request:

    rollUpPeriodType - *mandatory - enum
    period - *mandatory
    => startDate
    => endDate
    ownerType - enum
    ownerId
    campaignId
    isRolledUpSliceAtCampaignLevel

folders.name: 05 MERCHANT CARE APIs (MEC) - POST Statistics (XLS-76)
folders.description:
This story is linked to XLS-141

Once the structure will be completed for the campaigns statistics, swagger will be updated with details.

In fact, it should be the same structure without the campaign information.

messageChannelType is saved as "Receipt" and receiptMessageDetails has been saved

requests.name: 89. isCascadedAwardTriggered is invalid
requests.description:
Scenario: isCascadedAwardTriggered is invalid
Given I have access to POST create a new campaign API
When I send a POST request with isCascadedAwardTriggered is invalid in the request
And send rest of the information in the request
Then the request is not processed with the message "is Award Triggered Again After Counter Reset is not of expected datatype"

422 Unprocessable Entity
BAD_FORMAT
is Award Triggered Again After Counter Reset is not of expected datatype

requests.name: 6. Status value is Deleted
requests.description:
Scenario: Status value is Deleted
Given I have access to GET Campaigns API
When I send a GET request with a value on “Status=Deleted” field
And send rest of the information in the request
Then the request is processed, the server returns all campaigns with only Deleted status

requests.name: 5. Statistics - Nominal case  rollUpPeriodType is Per Quarter
requests.description:
Scenario: Statistics - Nominal case  rollUpPeriodType is Per Quarter
Given I have access to POST compute merchant statistics API
When I send a POST request with a correct request with Statistics - Nominal case  rollUpPeriodType is Per Quarter
Then the request is processed
And HTTP status “200 OK” is returned with a list of historical statistics per merchant based on "rollUpPeriodType=Per Quarter" field and on "period" field. The statistics are about aggregated transactions filtered by Merchant ID.

rollUpSlice is the date per Quarter, format "YYYY-QX"

"Per Quarter" - the statistics is for maximum on 1 year from the start date.

requests.name: 25. Statistics - campaignId is not in the system
requests.description:
Scenario:  campaignId is not in the system
Given I have access to POST compute campaign statistics API
When I send a POST request with merchant is not in the system
Then the request is processed
And HTTP status “200 OK” is returned

fields not part of the request will be ignored

requests.name: 6. Merchant Type values - ONLY 'Mono Merchant'
requests.description:
Scenario: Merchant Type values - ONLY 'Mono Merchant'
Given I have access to POST create a new campaign API
When I send a POST request with a wrong value on “type” field
And send rest of the information in the request
Then the request is not processed with the message: 

422 Unprocessable Entity
UNKNOWN_FIELD_VALUE
No type of Multi Merchant found

requests.name: 2. Nominal Case - Amount Discount Cmpgn with Percent PurchaseAmt , ownerType is PM, ownerID is not define
requests.description:
Scenario: Nominal Case - Amount Discount Cmpgn with Percent PurchaseAmt , ownerType is Program Manager and ownerId is not define 
Given I have access to POST create a new campaign API
When I send a correct RFM amount discount campaign for percent purchase amount with campaignType=Mono merchant and ownerType is Program Manager and ownerId is not define data structure
Then the campaign is created successfully
And HTTP status “201 Created” is returned
And the complete details of the created campaign are returned including:
• A server generated value for campaignId
• href filed populated with the url to get the campaign using its identifier.

OwnerId is not mandatory if the ownerType is Program manager

requests.name: 11. Statistics - rollUpPeriodType field is invalid
requests.description:
Scenario:  rollUpPeriodType field is invalid
Given I have access to POST compute campaign statistics API
When I send a POST request with a correct request with  rollUpPeriodType field is invalid
Then the request is not processed with the message "No rollUpPeriodType of Per Century found".

422 Unprocessable Enity
UNKNOWN_FIELD_VALUE
No rollUpPeriodType of Per Century found

requests.name: 20. Owner Type values is Program manager
requests.description:
Scenario: Owner Type values is Program manager
Given I have access to GET Campaigns API
When I send a GET request with a value on “ownerType=Program manager” field
And send rest of the information in the request
Then the request is processed, the server returns all Program manager campaigns regardless of type and status.

Given I have access to POST compute campaign statistics API
When I send a POST request with a correct request with Statistics - Nominal case  rollUpPeriodType is Per Quarter
Then the request is processed
And HTTP status “200 OK” is returned with a list of historical statistics per campaign based on "rollUpPeriodType=Per Quarter" field and on "period" field. The statistics are about aggregated transactions filtered by Merchant ID.

rollUpSlice is the date per Quarter, format "YYYY-QX"

"Per Quarter" - the statistics is for maximum on 1 year from the start date.

requests.name: 25. 406 Not Acceptable
requests.description:
Scenario: 406 Not Acceptable
Given I have access to GET Campaigns API
When I send a GET request with invalid accept header
Then the request is not processed
And HTTP status “406 Not Acceptable” is returned with no HTTP body.
